channel.title: Free forum/website hosting [no smfforfree2(3)] A MUST READ
channel.description:
Hi everyone. I Am an admin with cheaphostdirect.com I am Making a Package for People with Moparscape. Normaly you have to pay for hosting with us but now i am letting people host their forums on it.
[b] Features [/b] Package: Free Max FTP Accounts: 2 Max Email Accounts: 5 Max Email Lists: 0 Max Databases: 3 Max Sub Domains: 5 Max Parked Domains: 0 Max Addon Domains: 0 Dedicated IP: NO Shell Access: NO CGI Access: YES Frontpage Extensions: YES Quota (Disk Space): 500 MB Bandwidth: 2.5 gig. [b]We can host your domain[/b]
This package is ideal for forum hosting. Please Sign up for this at: www.codexonline.info/hosting [b] For more ideal hosting packages, please visit www.cheaphostdirect.com/shared.html[/b]
If you would like more info on forum hosting/website hosting, please email me or PM me.
